description: Critical review of the theory & practice of health promotion planning & evaluation, including epidemiology of physical activity and the planning and evaluation of 'best practice' programmes for the promotion of physical activity in Queensland communities.
prerequisites: HMST1000/HPRM1000 + HMST3010 or HM371 or HPRM3000
incompatible: HM471 or HMST3013 or 4013 or HPRM3001
